review: Dr.Chetan is an amazingly talented doctor. I have been visiting him from 2 years now. He understands the concern patiently and also explains the reason well to the patient.

Doctor is very intelligent as one of my relative was described as a cancer patient but when we consulted Chetan sir then we got to know that my relative was not a cancer patient , from that point we started consulting sir and took treatment from him .And from that time till now my relative is fit and fine and comes to meet sir for his regular check up. I will recommend you to consult sir once and after that you 'll surely start taking treatment from him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

review: The doctor was not even asked anything. I just said I have covid. He wrote medicines that's it. He not even asked if I am having any issue in my body *** *** **** ******* *****
Doctor is really very positive and treats the patient very nicely .The hospital staff is also very cooperative . You should consult this doctor **** ** *** **** ****** **** *** **** * **** ********

** ** *** **** ****** ** *********** ***** **** good hospital team with many facilities. Doctor is really very friendly and take the patients condition very seriously. Thanks sir for providing such a good health care system here..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: ** ** **** **** ****** good experience for my health problem opd also my nearby ist so easy to come here &  I'm very happy

Cronus hospital and the doctor all are not responsible at all.you give your life to them and they and their under trained staff just are just treating you with least care.
. No facilities,no cleanliness,no basic facilities in room and most importantly pathetic nurses and doctors. 
Horrible experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: i am waiting more than 1hour.. Nobody can't help for anything.. all are busy on there Duty.. Not Satisfied.. Doctor are Not Good also.
Waiting time is too much and even after waiting for long time Dr. Didn't give sufficient time... Can't help it everybody is busy ðŸ˜©
